description:
Ja`far is a former member of Parthevia`s undercover unit, the assassins http://anidb.net/ch84317 [Sham Lash]. After the 6th Dungeon, http://anidb.net/ch84270 [Valefor], was conquered by http://anidb.net/ch63160 [Sinbad], he decided to serve him as a vassal and joined him in his travels.
Source: Magi Wiki, edited.
name: Ja`far
